Sendedmail.subject: Re: Announcing our Referral Program
Sendedmail.body:
-------------------- Forwarded message --------------------
Subject: Re:Announcing our Referral Program
To: updates@pepitransport.com

Pepipost Newsletter Pepipost Referral Program Hi kreyonsys, We are happy to serve you and it will be our continued pleasure to serve some of your friends, colleagues and associates as well. That???s why we???d love it if you joined our newly launched *Refer-A-Friend* program. The best thing about it is that you can earn rewards every time one of them comes on board the Pepipost platform. What are you waiting for? *REFER NOW * *To Get Started:* Click on *???Refer-A-Friend???* in your dashboard and we???ll send you a link to share with your friends, colleagues and associates. *You???ll get: *A reward of *$50.00* on the first recharge your friend makes. * Your friend will get: *A discount of *20%* on every recharge for 3 months. Refer as many people as you want and keep earning rewards on every paid sign-up. Get going! Cheers, Tanishq Juneja CEO and Email Guy @ Pepipost Follow us ??? 2018 Pepipost Unsubscribe or view in browser Trinity House, Charleston Road, Ranelagh, Dublin 6,D06 C8X4 You are receiving this email because you are a Pepipost customer.
